Ooze Odyssey is an engaging platform game that challenges players to navigate a vibrant world filled with slime, puzzles, and delicious fruits. As a slime snake, players must strategically maneuver their slimy body across slick paths to reach the exit. The objective is to grow bigger by consuming the fruits along the way, all while avoiding the risk of falling off the treacherous platforms. The game's standout feature is the ability to create custom levels, allowing players to design their own gooey puzzles and challenge their friends to solve them.
